website_summaries.verdict: A simple, natural choice for a reasonable price.
pros: Made with such natural ingredients, it is even safe enough to eat
Fair Trade sugar is suspended in a moisturizing mix of calendula, coconut oil, olive oil, and vitamin E
cons: Some find the grains of sugar to be too large for their liking

customer_reviews.title: Super soft lips!!
customer_reviews.text: Best lip scub i have used. Had clean ingredients. The sugar and natural oils exfoliate your lips without being harsh and stripping. I like to follow up with and all natual lip balm. I like to use this before sleep. I gently scrub my lips, and leave it on for 5 minute or so. Wipe with a warm cloth. A little bit of the oil will be left on. I massage this in, and follow up with and all natual lip balm. 2 times a week. Softest lips ever!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’d definitely recommend this product! Smells great, not too rough, even has a pleasant taste, and works really well. I have dry crusty lips year around and I’ve tried everything, so I didn’t have high expectations, but I was quite pleased! It left my lips very moisturized for most of the day and smooth for me (meaning less crusty than usual).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Saldana

customer_reviews.title: does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: this product does do its job! it does scrub off the extra dry skin you don’t want or can’t pick off. it does what it says. it’s nothing amazing but it works. also the people saying it tastes good? haha ahh no. it doesn’t taste good. it doesn’t taste horrible but it’s not something i would say taste good. i wipe it off gently after using.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Tastes decent too. the container comes filled very high, definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice scrub, very small for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good scrub. There is a good density and distribution of sugar crystals. The flavor is almost exactly the flavor of vanilla extract. The oil is heavy. However, the pot is MUCH smaller than expected for $11.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip scrub. It makes my lips feel so soft and hydrated. Not to mention it tastes good also. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Nice all natural organic lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: A nice all natural organic lip scrub. The natural sugars scrub gently, the oils moisturize your lips. I wish it smelled better (why I took off one star) as I really smell the jojoba oil, rather than the vanilla. But it works nicely and feels great
customer_reviews.author: kvg

customer_reviews.title: Daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, taste good, easy to use, moisturizers pretty well. But doesn't necessarily scrub all the dead skin off. I still love the product tho.
customer_reviews.author: Stanzi

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of this!
customer_reviews.text: Really love the scent/flavor of this. It works really well to help moisturize your lips and really make them feel great and refreshed. I love it! I definitely needed this for the dry winter months to help nourish my lips.
customer_reviews.author: nicole l butts

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, not to abrasive.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It smells like true vanilla. Like baking cookie vanilla vs cheap fragrance vanilla. It is not to abrasive, but it exfoliates really well. Leaves my lips with a slight tingle, which I like. Makes them super soft! I also use the Beauty by Earth chapstick afterwards. Great combo!
customer_reviews.author: Stefler

customer_reviews.title: love this one
customer_reviews.text: it makes ur lips so smooth and healthy looking beautiful for the whole day
customer_reviews.author: Sherin Bass

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Clean packaging. Quality ingredients. Was good to know my daughter's could use it too without fear of them using chemical ingredients. We have all the enjoyed the lip scrub product and its benefits of baby soft lips. Have also noticed lipstick lasting longer when applied after using this product. Would definitely buy again for ourselves and gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: yap

customer_reviews.title: Not Excited.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. I have a difficulty with chaffed lips and this year it has been worse. I have used a different name brand until someone bragged on this one to me. This is no better than what I was using. Sorry I can't reccommended,,,, except maybe for the taste, it tastes like Christmas Cookies :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Figg

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Lips Soft
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of the vanilla. I love how soft my lips feel after using this. I try to exfoliate my lips 2-3 times a week before bed. This container is small but seems to last a long time since you don't need too much of it per application. I'd purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Angie R

customer_reviews.title: Lips don't stay moisturized - very small container for an expensive price!
customer_reviews.text: I had watched many videos of women using lip scrubs to help with chapped lips, so I decided to give this brand a try. Unfortunately, I was disappointed as soon as I opened the package. The size of this little container is ridiculous. I used a little bit for two nights in a row and it does smell amazing, but it actually made me get a zit on my lip line. Anyone who has had a pimple on your lip line knows they hurts the worst (especially for being so small). Also, my lips didn't stop peeling and did not stay moisturized. I ended up returning this and I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Tears up my lips
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a dry-skin problem on my lips before I used this. I ordered it to see if it made lips feel softer and if it made lipstick application smoother. However, it seems to have torn up my lips. They are now dry and peeling, whereas I never had that problem before. I may just be sensitive to it - this might not be a problem for every user. But for me, it isn't a good product. It smells/tastes good though!
customer_reviews.author: yay ILNP

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Expect Much
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by amount of product received - about one tablespoon in a tiny jar (1.5” x 1.25” diameter) that wasn’t completely filled. The jar arrived inside a small cardboard box but the jar lid looks beat up, like it had been used before. Labeling looks new! Photos are after one use. Scent and flavor are OK but moisturizing results don’t last long. Wish I’d researched DIY lip scrubs before buying. Not a good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: JanMc

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: Will not be re ordering this product. The pictures are deceitful. The bottle is so tiny...tiny! My bottle was 1/2 full when I opened it. This scrub has not done nothing for my lips. I think exfoliating with my regular wash cloth and putting on chapstick before bed is more helpful than this. It says like on for 2 mins and I dont see the point. Personally, you can create your own DIY with coconut oil and brown sugar...my lips were still dry. Nothing was exfoliated. Will not repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Malia Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Effective, cruelty free, and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is a great way to wake up! When I feel the need to exfoliate my lips (twice a week or so), this little pot provides a great scrub that isn't painful, but is effective. A bonus? It tastes pretty good too! It's comforting to know that a product's ingredients are so natural they can be ingested. It's also cruelty free, which is a must for me as an animal advocate.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Great lip scrub. I wipe it off most of the time with a towel but it doesn’t taste bad if you get it in your mouth so that’s good. It’s lasted me a good couple months and I still have more than half the jar left. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Deerman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this scrub for a few days now specifically in the morning time to see how my lips feel throughout the day. Since this scrub has a sugar base, it obviously doesn't taste bad. But more importantly my lips feel great after using it -- almost like that clean feeling you get after a bomb facial. Top off after with some vitamin e oil, and its a winning combo.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jones

customer_reviews.title: Left lips dry
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this exfoliation. I stopped using lip balms a couple of years ago and now only use an exfoliation at night. This helps to prevent me picking at my lips. This exfoliation left my lips feeling dry and I was reaching to use it more often. I may as well continue using lip balms. I’ve got back to my other exfoliation, which also happens to be cheaper. I also wasn’t much for the vanilla flavor.
customer_reviews.author: JGray

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I loved this lip balm, it smells gorgeous!!! It feels lovely and it’s tiny and so cute, my lips feel rich, awesome for the winter soon coming.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: meahhhh
customer_reviews.text: did not do the job for me. not enough exfoliation. and did not leave a nice film of moisture on my lips after. my lips felt dry and i will be returning the item. i have tried many lip scrubs i thought this one would be amazing because it was high rather and organic but somethings just need the extra ingredients. this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: kay nash

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Yes, the jar is very small, but it only takes a very little bit to scrub lips. It smells like vanilla and taste like sugar, it is very easy to use. I have very dry lips that seem to always be chapped no matter what I use. But this has made my lips smooth and soft. It’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Amazon find, yet!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews but I tried this last night and was blown away by how amazing it is! I couldn't stop touching my lips! They've been feeling very dry lately and this was the remedy I was desperate for! My next door neighbor ordered it immediately after trying mine! I'm definitely ordering again
customer_reviews.author: mindymc

customer_reviews.title: A Very Effective Exfoliating Scrub - A Necessity in Your Toiletries Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip scrub! BTW, it’s not supposed to be moisturizing, but it is a great exfoliating scrub. It is very effective to get loose skin and chapped lips smoothed out. After exfoliating use a good moisturizing balm. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Kellogg Ketroser

customer_reviews.title: Meh- It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: Product came in on time- I’m not ‘impressed’ by any means. It somewhat helps with dead skin but I wouldn’t call it a moisturizer at all. It might relieve my dry & chapped lips for 10 or so minutes and then they are back to being dry again. It taste great & smells delicious so I’m going to keep it around as a last resort.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Professional Seller
customer_reviews.text: First time trying a lip scrub, and I love this product already. With the first frost and snow already behind us this season in New England, this lip scrub has made a noticeable difference to my lips, which were already getting "weathered." Worked wonders from the first application. And the seller has sent two kind and useful follow-up emails, just checking in and offering product tips. Very professional. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: E Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I was oddly very surprised how much I liked this! It doesn't leave any kind of residual taste in my mouth like most chopsticks and lip scrubs do and its very soft. A little bit goes a long way so even though its a small tub I can tell it'll last a verryy long time. It would definitely make a great little stocking stuffer or a secret Santa kind of gift for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor c.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip scrub. Comes in a cute package, feels great on the lips, edible, leaves my lips with a very glossy, tinted look which I love. Ordered it just in time and has helped my chapped lips tremendously in the few days I’ve had it. Will order a different scent next time, not a big fan of vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Scrub, Only Left my Lips Greasy
customer_reviews.text: I normally used Soft Candy Lip Scrub by Treat. However, they switched formulas and went from a jar lip scrub into a chap stick like lip scrub so I wanted to see what else was out there. This was a BIG disappointment as I didn't feel it scrubbed my lips at all, but mainly made them very greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason why it not a five star because this does not smell like vanilla or at least the scent isn’t as strong as other lip scrub I’ve had in the past maybe because it’s organic?? But this doesn’t not stop me from reordering again! It super moisturizing and does what it suppose to do!
customer_reviews.author: jade prak

customer_reviews.title: moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I did a thing & ordered this lip scrub & it did not disappoint. My lips are super soft. Due to wearing a mask all the time, it's not worth me wearing lipstick but that still doesn't mean have dry lips lol I'd order again.
customer_reviews.author: Traci T

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious spa like experience
customer_reviews.text: I love everything vanilla so I knew I had to try this. I also love that this product is organic made with sugar. The smell was divine. The scrub worked great and wasn’t too harsh. Left my lips feeling moisturized. Would definitely recommend for yourself or as a nice spa gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Okay at best
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I am terribly impressed with this product. To be honest, I think the lip scrub I make is better. Also, for the price, the amount you get is pretty disappointing. I feel the container is more of a sample size container. The sugar and oil melt quickly and I dont feel I get the full scrub effect.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver for my Dried Lips Caused by Antihistamines
customer_reviews.text: I am on antihistamines for the next three months, and I noticed my lips started becoming VERY VERY dry, and peeled, due to the side effect of the medication causing dehydration. This has SAVED my lips! I have only used this scrub twice and my lips are 95% back to their normal, supple, selves. I missed them so much, because I love wearing lipstick and gloss! My significant other even started using it, and he loves it too. I love how all the ingredients are all natural, and there are no fragrances that normally cause me an allergic reaction. I 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves. Pass.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a damp towel works better for rubbing dead skin off your lips followed by whatever moisturizer you like. This sugar dissolves quickly but also is kinda difficult to work with because it spreads on the surface when rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome, & feels softer
customer_reviews.text: Came in quickly and can definitely feel the difference after using! My lips are literally always chapped, and no chapstick or lib balm has ever helped improve that. I can feel that this definitely makes a positive difference though, so I’m hopeful! Also smells GREAT, and a bonus is that customer service sends out instructions for use as well as a nice “thank you” message after you purchase, which I thought was nice :)
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: I dont eat it, and it doesn't smell like anything, which is fine to me. It "moisturizes" as long as your lips are still "moist". Other than that it doesn't do anything and it hasn't helped improve what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Nellemia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Accutane Dry Lips
customer_reviews.text: I'm on Accutane, and when I first started my lips were probably the only thing dry enough to kill a tardigrade. Between this, rose salve, and Aquaphor, I had my first hopes of not expiring via lethally chapped lips.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew W. Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, lip exfoliating goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously live this product! It smells and tastes great and does exactly what it's supposed to do as far as exfoliating and softening my lips. 2 enthusiastic thumbs way up!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sue

customer_reviews.title: It really  does its job
customer_reviews.text: I mean when I read 12 dollars For the size lol I was like no !! But to be honest is pretty good and leaves your lips Amazingly soft and removes all dead skin ! I really needed this I recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and does a great job of exfoliating your lips!
customer_reviews.text: Thia does a great job exfoliating the lips in preparation for applying your lipstick. It also smells amazing. We always exfolliate our faces and our lips are forgotten. Be sure to pamper them as well!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a cheap lip scrub. I feel like I could make this but for the price I’m comparison to others this is way easier. And even tastes good when I accidentally catch a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend. She said this stuff works great and is very moisturizing. The only downside is that it's such a small tub but would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Wethers

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand because they can be trusted as a non toxic product. I was very disappointed by this lip scrub. The pros are that it’s a pure vanilla flavor and affordable. The cons would be simply that it isn’t an effective exfoliate for my lips. My lips are still flaky and dry after use. Wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fuller Life

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and tastes fine. The crystals are too big for how sensitive my lips are. I make my own from brown sugar, local organic honey and coconut oil. Honestly, if the granuals were smaller, it'd be better. They're just too brash for my lips, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great all natural lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, not harsh to my lips, easily wipes off, leaves lips smooth, all natural.... i was surprised that i like it so much. Highly recommend. I had to review to let people know this is really good. Best scrub ive used so far.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Love this scrub and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip scrub! It is very creamy going on and smells wonderful. After the 1st use my lips were super soft. This lip scrub is perfect for the damage caused by the winter weather. The vanilla scent is awesome also.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The amount of product is a sample size
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how little this product is, like a sample size.. never again
customer_reviews.author: Mskitka

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to eat, literally!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this...despite not expecting to! Vanilla isn’t always my face flavor but this was so good, I found myself looking forward to it. Good enough to eat, literally!
customer_reviews.author: aparnamuk

customer_reviews.title: Not "scrub" at all
customer_reviews.text: The grains are too large to be exfoliating. Exfoliant should be fine grain, this is like big chunks of rock in some vaseline. Smells good, but NOT scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Barry

customer_reviews.title: Tiny jar of scrub
customer_reviews.text: Great product. But so small, it might as well be a sample. I bought for gifts, but now feel it's too small for a gift. (Previously purchased was 1 full oz. - expected the same)
customer_reviews.author: MEM3

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great lip scrub. The sugar/vanilla taste is great. It feels good on your lips and after your lips are so smooth with a light oil feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Gentle scrub. A little bit more on the oily side than I prefer and also smaller that I expected. But overall it’s a decent lip scrub
customer_reviews.author: Julybeauty

customer_reviews.title: The best lip scrub for your money
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is honestly perfect. It smells amazing, it works amazing, and it honestly tastes good to. After exfoliating my lips with the scrub, my lips feel unbelievably soft and I truly love it. Highly recommend it to anyone. I would say its better to buy this scrub than to make one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Zohaib

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this alternative to chapstick because it exfoliates your lips as well as moisturizing. The flavor is great and it makes them super soft
customer_reviews.author: michaela kinghorn

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make your lips feel smooth
customer_reviews.text: Being that I had never use this product before it was really really awesome that they sent me the instructions ahead of time in my email it helped a lot this product is an exceptionally good product and I will definitely be purchasing it again
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: To expensive
customer_reviews.text: This product it is extremely expensive for how small this little container is.😳.Not ordaring again
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Its okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be comparable to the BITE brand lip scrub and it’s not. It does exfoliate your lips just not as good as other brands. I would spend the money to get a more expensive one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne'a Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good scrub
customer_reviews.text: Taste like make-up + vanilla. I’m okay with it for now because I just wipe off the excess instead of licking it off (you can do so because it’s edible). I probably won’t be repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: Diana Reyes

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, tastes good. leaves my lips soft and moisturized. the consistency is great and perfect for exfoliation
customer_reviews.author: Liana Elola

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: $10 for a very very small container of nothing special. Homemade is better. Not worth purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Smells amazing. Noticed dramatic soft lips only after a few uses. Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Talin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My lips are always dry for some reason. And I love to do a scrub every week .... I recommend this product. My lips are super soft
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gundling

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, however it does NOT last. You must continue to apply the product for results.
customer_reviews.author: GSD

customer_reviews.title: Works well and taste well!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this product, I think it has helped me take better care of my lips.
customer_reviews.author: blueflowers23

customer_reviews.title: Lip saver
customer_reviews.text: My husband was asking for lip scrub and I got this for him. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla taste sweet
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to use sugar scrubs. This is the first one I've bought. I was hoping it would help take care of loose skin on the lips but it kinda failed on my expectations. I wish there were some instructions
customer_reviews.author: Divine Korie

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip scrub! It’s so amazing! I like that ingredients are natural, and that it actually works. Love the vanilla smell.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina B

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub smelled nice and had nice packaging but I didn’t feel it did a good job of exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Too messy and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: The base is way too oily. Too messy to apply and be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best lip scrub!!!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing!!!! Not to overwhelming a scent but just enough. I scrubbed my lips with it for about 30 seconds and then wiped it off and immediately my lips look better (no dry skin) they feel smoother. This product is the best liscrub and the for the price it’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry cracked lips didn’t really help with that, has a good smell and taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Artavia

customer_reviews.title: Great scrub
customer_reviews.text: First time to buy lip scrub and I love it, really works, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product to give my lips a good scrub. I need something a bit stronger overall its still a nice lip scrub.
customer_reviews.author: MsGrant

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like Play Doh smells
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this but I can't get past the fact that this tastes like play doh smells and doesn't come off right away when you wash your lips. I definitely don't taste or smell vanilla with this scrub.
customer_reviews.author: SevansTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry lips!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this product! My lips are very dry especially when I am wearing a mask. The formula is very moisturizing and won't make my lips bleed if I rub it around. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Lau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: Love the scrub, it does not have any bad taste either.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Garcia

customer_reviews.title: More kissable lips
customer_reviews.text: The lip scrub wasn't harsh or too sandy how I was expecting. My lips felt plumper and more hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Mari.AM

customer_reviews.title: Good value,  great scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is a good value for the person looking for organic beauty products. The sugar crystals were a little large but overall the product does what it's designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jennette N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub works great! You can wash it off or just lick it off! Smells/taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: LEAVES MY LIPS SMOOTH
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! Leaves my lips feeling new and clean. The only thing I didn’t find good was the taste and smell. Literally smells like playdoh and tastes like it as well. Maybe because I got Vanilla flavor and shouldn’t done mint or something. Other than that, does get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Yessie

customer_reviews.title: Lips feels super smooth
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. After I massage my lips for few minutes and washed, my lips feels super smooth. I had some flakes, seems its healing them. I can taste and smell vanilla flavor. But no after taste, which is good. Lips looks pinkish for some time. I am liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac M.

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: very oily, and cheap... you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliant!!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and smells amazing!! It tells you to pick the extra salt off but I just wipe it off. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Oily not very exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing, the flavor. It has a lot of oil, the exfoliation is minimal due to the high content of oil instead of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Rosamar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good lip scrub for my clients! Follow my Instagram for more beauty finds! @tiana_edwardss
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeee
customer_reviews.text: This is so wonderful! Lip skin is so sensitive and delicate but if you are like me I always have skin on my lip that needs to be exfoliated... I love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, tastes good and leave your lips feeling nice
customer_reviews.author: NAT.

customer_reviews.title: Lucious lips
customer_reviews.text: With winter coming in and my lips wanting to crack all the time, I love this new product I tried! Beyond happy with my purchase. Love the scent and have had products in the past that make my lips worse. Not this product! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Carter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It smells really good. The vanilla is not at all over powering. I like the way my lips felt after using it. Ohio weather can be hard on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Janica Powers

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's sweet and scrubs away the dead skin. I can taste the oil more than I care for, but I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shenetha

customer_reviews.title: So amazing in every way
customer_reviews.text: This is truly such an amazing product. You definitely need this item if you have dry or cracked lips. I have been using this product for 1 week and the skin around and on my lips feels so much better. The seller is so kind, and this product is so worth the price. Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Was worried that I would break out from it but that’s not the case. I actually keep it in my shower, along with the silicone lip brush I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Your lips feel amazing and the smell is sensational
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product. When you use the scrub it makes your lips feel so smooth. Its a gentle scrub that doesn’t damage the skin. And the smell.....you smell the vanilla for hours after you have washed the scrub off.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this lip scrub. Using it daily has kept the peeling skin off my lips and made them extra soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked the scrub but then after couple uses and washing off the product I would have oil around my mouth it would feel greasy . It didn’t do the job as far as really exfoliating my lips . I was hoping for better results
customer_reviews.author: Yessiie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sugar scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is everything! Seriously! I had issues with dry chapped peeling lips in my third trimester of pregnancy and after the one use they’re healed! Very happy will definitely rebuy and highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Brittany757

product_meta.title: Organic Lip Scrub - Vanilla Sugar Scrub, Lip Scrubs Exfoliator & Moisturizer, Lip Exfoliator, Lip Care Exfoliating Scrub and Lip Moisturizer for Chapped Lips Treatment, Lip Repair for Soft Lips
feature_bullets: DON'T LET DRY CRACKED LIPS ruin that smile! If your chapped lips are keeping you from showing your smile, our organic vanilla lip scrub is here to change that. Naturally delicious, this scrub is a safe, gentle, and effective way to banish dry, flaky lips. Use it to exfoliate twice a week for a smile you’ll have a hard time hiding.

TWICE A WEEK IS ALL IT TAKES: You don't need to apply lip balm every hour to keep your lips healthy. Our exfoliator works wonders to clear away dead skin and other junk while nourishing your lips with some of our favorite oils and extracts. When you’re done, your lips will exude health, happiness, and radiance - and they will feel as healthy as they look.

PRACTICAL AND DELICIOUS: Whoever said “beauty is pain” has never tried our lip exfoliant. Grab a lip scrub or two of our delightfully delicious lip treatments. Infused with fair trade certified sugar scrubs and vanilla extract, this scrub is just as indulgent for your sweet tooth as it is for your smile.

SO SAFE YOU CAN EAT IT: We say “no” to phthalates, parabens, sulfates, artificial fragrance, artificial flavors, and all that other junk. All you'll find in organic lip exfoliant are natural oils, beeswax, fair trade certified sugar, and natural flavoring. Our sugar scrub contains only natural and organic materials, is vegan, cruelty free, uses environmentally sound packaging, and is made in the USA.

LOVE IT OR LET US KNOW: We know you’re gonna love how this lip scrub makes your lips feel. We’re so confident that we’ll even guarantee it - because every product we sell comes with an Unconditional Customer Satisfaction Guarantee. If at any point you don’t love your sunscreen, just send it back and we’ll give you a full refund – no awkward questions required.
